Text:
Thanks for taking the time to upload requested movies at exceptional quality.

If you ever get the time could you consider uploading Pearl Harbor (2001), King Arthur (2004), The Scorpion King (2002) & The Scorpion King 2: Rise of a Warrior (2008).
Hey, can you do the friends series?
If you get the time could you please upload American Beauty in mp4 format. I have seen 2 but they have no seeders. Please help! Thank you very much for all the great uploads
